checkitem.desc: Client Change Option for Production Systems
checkitem.compliant: MANDT like '%' and ((CCCATEGORY = 'P' and CCCORACTIV = '2' and CCNOCLIIND = '3') OR (CCCATEGORY != 'P'))
checkitem.noncompliant: MANDT like '%' and (CCCATEGORY = 'P' and not ( CCCORACTIV = '2' and CCNOCLIIND = '3' ))

checkitem.desc: Global Modifiable Change Option for Production Systems
checkitem.compliant: (NAME = 'GLOBAL_SETTING' and VALUE = 'NOT MODIFIABLE' and ptree.value = 'PROD' and ptree.hier_id = '1') OR (ptree.value != 'PROD' and ptree.hier_id = '1')
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'GLOBAL_SETTING' and not ( VALUE = 'NOT MODIFIABLE' ) and ptree.value = 'PROD' and ptree.hier_id = '1'
